pages.title: Warthog
pages.text: The common warthog ($(o)Phacochoerus africanus$()) is a wild member of the pig family ($(o)Suidae$()) found in grassland, savanna, and woodland in sub-Saharan Africa.

pages.title: Warthog
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beetroot$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
